trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for a script control.
ScriptControl inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls.
The ScriptControl is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly.
Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class.
The ScriptControl base class tests the page for a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the `PreRender` stage of the derived control.
The ScriptControl base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to register script during the `Render` event.
This includes registering <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects for the ScriptControl when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method is called.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method makes sure that <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects are not rendered unless the ScriptControl itself is rendered.
This enables a ScriptControl to work inside a closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from ScriptControl.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptControl"></xref> class in a derived class.
When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*> event and registers the script control with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control.

After the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the base class is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the script control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.

Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*> event and sends server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the server control content.
When overridden in a derived class, registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
When overridden in a derived class, registers script files for the control.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
